text: The Bauhaus Center is a gallery, shop and information center for the Bauhaus (modernist) architecture of Tel Aviv. It is a private institution, working together with public organizations such as Tel Aviv City Hall and UNESCO. It is located at 77 Dizengoff Street in the White City of Tel Aviv area. == Other websites == * Tel Aviv Bauhaus Center website * * * Review of the Center on Fodor's travel guide * Reviews on TripAdvisor travel website Category:Buildings and structures in Tel Aviv Category:Organizations based in Tel Aviv Category:Architectural organizations Category:Israeli culture Category:20th-century architecture
title: Tel Aviv Bauhaus Center
